subject: Languages
title: Was Writing Invented Once or Many Times?
description: A micro-lesson that makes Was Writing Invented Once or Many Times? usable.

hook.text: Did writing spread from one brilliant invention, or did multiple cultures invent it independently?

buildup.text: Scholars agree on at least three independent inventions: Sumer, China, and Mesoamerica.

discovery.text: The Maya developed a complete writing system with no contact with the Old World.

twist.text: Egypt may have been a fourth independent invention â€” or may have been inspired by Sumer. Scholars disagree.

climax.text: The idea that writing must spread from a single source underestimates human ingenuity everywhere.

punchline.text: Writing is such a good idea that humans couldn't help inventing it more than once.

quiz.question: How many times was writing independently invented?
